pages.label: Introduction
pages.content:
Welcome to Our Roleplay Server! üåü

We're thrilled to have you join our immersive roleplay community. This guidebook will help you understand everything you need to know about roleplay and our server.

Server Features ‚ú®

  • Realistic Economy System
  • Custom Jobs & Businesses
  • Player Housing
  • Advanced Criminal System
  • Active Staff Support

pages.label: Roleplay Rules
pages.content:
Essential RP Rules üìú

1. Value Your Life (VDL)

Always act as if you have one life. Avoid unrealistic actions that would be fatal in real life.

2. No Powergaming

Don't force actions on other players or perform impossible feats.

3. No Metagaming

Don't use out-of-character information in roleplay.

4. Stay In Character

Maintain your character's personality and story at all times.
